speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: SCENE III. Another room in the same.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter POMPEY

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I am as well acquainted here as I was in our house

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: of profession: one would think it were Mistress

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Overdone's own house, for here be many of her old

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: customers. First, here's young Master Rash; he's in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: for a commodity of brown paper and old ginger,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: ninescore and seventeen pounds; of which he made

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: five marks, ready money: marry, then ginger was not

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: much in request, for the old women were all dead.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Then is there here one Master Caper, at the suit of

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Three-pile the mercer, for some four suits of

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: peach-coloured satin, which now peaches him a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: beggar. Then have we here young Dizy, and young

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Deep-vow, and Master Copperspur, and Master

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Starve-lackey the rapier and dagger man, and young

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Drop-heir that killed lusty Pudding, and Master

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Forthlight the tilter, and brave Master Shooty the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: great traveller, and wild Half-can that stabbed

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Pots, and, I think, forty more; all great doers in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: our trade, and are now 'for the Lord's sake.'

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter ABHORSON

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Sirrah, bring Barnardine hither.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Barnardine! you must rise and be hanged.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Barnardine!

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: What, ho, Barnardine!

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: [Within]  A pox o' your throats! Who makes that

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: noise there? What are you?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Your friends, sir; the hangman. You must be so

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: good, sir, to rise and be put to death.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: [Within]  Away, you rogue, away! I am sleepy.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Tell him he must awake, and that quickly too.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Pray, Master Barnardine, awake till you are

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: executed, and sleep afterwards.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Go in to him, and fetch him out.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: He is coming, sir, he is coming; I hear his straw rustle.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Is the axe upon the block, sirrah?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Very ready, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Enter BARNARDINE

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: How now, Abhorson? what's the news with you?

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Truly, sir, I would desire you to clap into your

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: prayers; for, look you, the warrant's come.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: You rogue, I have been drinking all night; I am not

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: fitted for 't.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: O, the better, sir; for he that drinks all night,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: and is hanged betimes in the morning, may sleep the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: sounder all the next day.

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Look you, sir; here comes your ghostly father: do

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: we jest now, think you?

speaker: ABHORSON
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sir, induced by my charity, and hearing how hastily

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you are to depart, I am come to advise you, comfort

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you and pray with you.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: Friar, not I I have been drinking hard all night,

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: and I will have more time to prepare me, or they

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: shall beat out my brains with billets: I will not

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: consent to die this day, that's certain.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, sir, you must: and therefore I beseech you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Look forward on the journey you shall go.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: I swear I will not die to-day for any man's

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: persuasion.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But hear you.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: Not a word: if you have any thing to say to me,

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: come to my ward; for thence will not I to-day.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text_entry: Exit

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Unfit to live or die: O gravel heart!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: After him, fellows; bring him to the block.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt ABHORSON and POMPEY

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Now, sir, how do you find the prisoner?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: A creature unprepared, unmeet for death;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And to transport him in the mind he is

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Were damnable.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Here in the prison, father,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: There died this morning of a cruel fever

speaker: Provost
text_entry: One Ragozine, a most notorious pirate,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: A man of Claudio's years; his beard and head

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Just of his colour. What if we do omit

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This reprobate till he were well inclined;

speaker: Provost
text_entry: And satisfy the deputy with the visage

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Of Ragozine, more like to Claudio?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: O, 'tis an accident that heaven provides!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Dispatch it presently; the hour draws on

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Prefix'd by Angelo: see this be done,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And sent according to command; whiles I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Persuade this rude wretch willingly to die.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: This shall be done, good father, presently.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: But Barnardine must die this afternoon:

speaker: Provost
text_entry: And how shall we continue Claudio,

speaker: Provost
text_entry: To save me from the danger that might come

speaker: Provost
text_entry: If he were known alive?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Let this be done.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Put them in secret holds, both Barnardine and Claudio:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Ere twice the sun hath made his journal greeting

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To the under generation, you shall find

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Your safety manifested.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I am your free dependant.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Quick, dispatch, and send the head to Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit Provost

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Now will I write letters to Angelo,--

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The provost, he shall bear them, whose contents

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Shall witness to him I am near at home,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And that, by great injunctions, I am bound

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To enter publicly: him I'll desire

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To meet me at the consecrated fount

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: A league below the city; and from thence,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: By cold gradation and well-balanced form,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: We shall proceed with Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Here is the head; I'll carry it myself.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Convenient is it. Make a swift return;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For I would commune with you of such things

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That want no ear but yours.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: I'll make all speed.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exit

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: [Within]  Peace, ho, be here!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The tongue of Isabel. She's come to know

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If yet her brother's pardon be come hither:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But I will keep her ignorant of her good,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To make her heavenly comforts of despair,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: When it is least expected.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter ISABELLA

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Ho, by your leave!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Good morning to you, fair and gracious daughter.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The better, given me by so holy a man.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Hath yet the deputy sent my brother's pardon?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: He hath released him, Isabel, from the world:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: His head is off and sent to Angelo.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Nay, but it is not so.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It is no other: show your wisdom, daughter,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: In your close patience.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O, I will to him and pluck out his eyes!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You shall not be admitted to his sight.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Unhappy Claudio! wretched Isabel!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Injurious world! most damned Angelo!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This nor hurts him nor profits you a jot;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Forbear it therefore; give your cause to heaven.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Mark what I say, which you shall find

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: By every syllable a faithful verity:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The duke comes home to-morrow; nay, dry your eyes;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: One of our convent, and his confessor,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Gives me this instance: already he hath carried

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Notice to Escalus and Angelo,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Who do prepare to meet him at the gates,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: There to give up their power. If you can, pace your wisdom

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: In that good path that I would wish it go,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And you shall have your bosom on this wretch,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Grace of the duke, revenges to your heart,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And general honour.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I am directed by you.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This letter, then, to Friar Peter give;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: 'Tis that he sent me of the duke's return:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Say, by this token, I desire his company

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: At Mariana's house to-night. Her cause and yours

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I'll perfect him withal, and he shall bring you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Before the duke, and to the head of Angelo

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Accuse him home and home. For my poor self,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I am combined by a sacred vow

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And shall be absent. Wend you with this letter:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Command these fretting waters from your eyes

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: With a light heart; trust not my holy order,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If I pervert your course. Who's here?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Enter LUCIO

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Good even. Friar, where's the provost?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Not within, sir.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: O pretty Isabella, I am pale at mine heart to see

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: thine eyes so red: thou must be patient. I am fain

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: to dine and sup with water and bran; I dare not for

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: my head fill my belly; one fruitful meal would set

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: me to 't. But they say the duke will be here

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: to-morrow. By my troth, Isabel, I loved thy brother:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: if the old fantastical duke of dark corners had been

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: at home, he had lived.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Exit ISABELLA

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sir, the duke is marvellous little beholding to your

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: reports; but the best is, he lives not in them.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Friar, thou knowest not the duke so well as I do:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: he's a better woodman than thou takest him for.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Well, you'll answer this one day. Fare ye well.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Nay, tarry; I'll go along with thee

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I can tell thee pretty tales of the duke.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You have told me too many of him already, sir, if

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: they be true; if not true, none were enough.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: I was once before him for getting a wench with child.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Did you such a thing?

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Yes, marry, did I but I was fain to forswear it;

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: they would else have married me to the rotten medlar.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sir, your company is fairer than honest. Rest you well.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: By my troth, I'll go with thee to the lane's end:

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: if bawdy talk offend you, we'll have very little of

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: it. Nay, friar, I am a kind of burr; I shall stick.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Exeunt
